text: alaha ne izata vale ghara (ka'aba) nu lokam la'i amana da pratika thapi'a hai ate sanamanita mahini'am, kurabani ate unham janavaram nu jinham de galam vica pate bane ho'e hona. Iha isa la'i ki tusim samajha sake ki alaha nu pata hai jo kujha asamanam ate dharati upara hai. Alaha isa nu janada hai
